alert.note: Alert for DeKalb; Jackson (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 17 at 1:41PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Jackson and northeastern DeKalb Counties through 215 PM CDT... At 141 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles south of Trenton to near Sylvania. Movement was southeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Scottsboro, Fort Payne, Rainsville, Henagar, Sylvania, Hollywood, Ider, Pisgah, Valley Head and Hammondville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
